pages.text: If Seasons is enabled, Cows take 2 season years to mature.

Cows require $(li)Water $(li)Grass $(li)Hay $(li)Straw(optional) $(li)TMR(optional) $(br2)If cows are missing water,grass and hay, they will eventually die. $(br)Drops Manure (x4). $(br)Manure drop is doubled (x8) if cows are given straw. $(br2)Milk production is increased with straw and TMR. $(br2)At max production, cows can be milked up to 4 times per minecraft day.$(br)
